pr_title: [Issue 5999] Support create/update tenant with empty cluster

timeline.message: Support create/update tenant with empty cluster.
treat a blank cluster as a cluster is not specified

timeline.author: sijie

timeline.bodyText:
What's the purpose of this check?
If a caller passes a list like ["", ""] the request will fail because the empty string is not a valid cluster in allowedClusters.
timeline.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText: This check is only used to make the request with blank clusters valid，i.e. use new TenantInfo() for create/update.
replies.author: murong00
